title: SQL ServerCHAR()Function

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerCHAR()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the character based on the number code 65:
SELECT CHAR(65) AS CodeToCharacter;

Definition and Usage
The CHAR() function returns the character based on the ASCII code.
Syntax
CHAR(
code
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
code
Required. The ASCII number code to return the character for
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers SQL ServerCHAR()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQL ServerCHAR()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQL ServerCHAR()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
